channel.title: Java Heap Error
channel.description:
Everytime i try to run my client i get to the login screen then i get this error after i log in before the screen loads
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:690) at Class46.method578(Class46.java:196) at Class7.method175(Class7.java:616) at Class7.method190(Class7.java:1427) at client.method22(client.java:398) at client.method54(client.java:2407) at client.method53(client.java:2355) at client.method62(client.java:2798) at client.method7(client.java:1865) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115) at client.run(client.java:4263) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
My run.bat looks like this @ECHO OFF echo HentaiScape title HentaiScape Client color 70 java -classpath . EGUI JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError pause
Please help i cant figure this out[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2009, 03:14:58 pm[/size][hr]anyoneeee?

item.title: Java Heap Error
item.dc:creator: @santacool3 santacool3
item.description:
@santacool3 wrote:

Everytime i try to run my client i get to the login screen then i get this error after i log in before the screen loads

Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:690)
at Class46.method578(Class46.java:196)
at Class7.method175(Class7.java:616)
at Class7.method190(Class7.java:1427)
at client.method22(client.java:398)
at client.method54(client.java:2407)
at client.method53(client.java:2355)
at client.method62(client.java:2798)
at client.method7(client.java:1865)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115)
at client.run(client.java:4263)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

My run.bat looks like this
@ECHO OFF
echo HentaiScape
title HentaiScape Client
color 70
java -classpath . EGUI
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
-XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError
pause

Please help i cant figure this out[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2009, 03:14:58 pm[/size][hr]anyoneeee?

Read full topic
